>
[Raging Intimidation](/Feats.aspx?ID=5810) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your fury fills your foes with fear. While you are raging, your [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) and [Scare to Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=5208) actions (from the Intimidation skill and an Intimidation skill feat, respectively) gain the [rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=680) trait, allowing you to use them while raging. As soon as you meet the prerequisites for the skill feats [Intimidating Glare](/Feats.aspx?ID=5162) and Scare to Death, you gain these feats.
name: Raging Intimidation
